name: Catherine's Sirloin Tip Roast
author: Kate Holmgreen
summary: This was my mother's signature recipe. Slice lengthwise, very thinly. Also delicious chilled, with spicy mustard on tiny party rolls.
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Make 8 (1/2 inch) slits around the roast, and insert 1/2 garlic clove into each slit
Place on a rack in roasting pan
Roast in preheated oven for 20 minutes
Reduce heat to 325 degrees F, and insert meat thermometer into roast
Continue cooking about 1 hour, or to desired doneness; remove from oven
Loosely cover with foil, and let roast stand 15 minutes before slicing
To serve, slice thinly against the grain, and use pan drippings for gravy
